name: Blak Mage Wite Mage
description:
In Blak Mage Wite Mage, take control of two mages named Blak and Wite. They decided venture into a one room dungeon, but found nothing of a mob of bats. They tried to escape, but the notice that the door has disappeared. However, Blak and Wite realized that they can use their powers to create a door themselves and escape the one room dungeon, while trying not to debacle from the swarm of bats.

Controls: 

  • Left Click to shoot magic a bats to make them disappear and the door to make it complete
  • Spacebar to swap between Blak and Wite
  • Shoot black bats with Wite magic and white bats with Blak magic
  • When the door is black, shoot it with Blak Magic to complete it. When the door is white, shoot it with Wite Magic to complete it.

This game was made as a submission to the Mini Jam #82: Doodle.
